parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query. If the NextToken parameter is empty, no subsequent requests are sent.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Auto Scaling resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the Auto Scaling resource. Set the value to scalinggroup, which indicates that the tag is bound to a scaling group.
